title: Ceiling Fans, Fire Pit Lounge, Picnic Area with BBQ, Spacious Kitchen*
posting_body: ['Colton Apartments', '320 Conestoga Way, Henderson, NV, 89002', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 25', 'OR Text', '25', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Your Journey Begins Here', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1140 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Colton Apartments represent the ultimate expression of Henderson, Nevada’s unique and adventurous spirit.', 'Designed to delight, this apartment community offers a world of simple sophistication, framed with endlessly fascinating views of boundless blue skies and majestic mountains.', 'Nestled at the crossroads of the Sloan Canyon National Conservation Area and Lake Mead, residents enjoy access to the area’s abundant recreational activities like hiking, biking, boating, rock climbing, and horseback riding.', 'Come discover large and pet-friendly one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartment homes.', 'Visualize better living as you relax in the tranquil heated spa, exceed your health goals in the fitness center, and enjoy meals with friends and family as you BBQ in the picnic area.', 'Every apartment home features a complete appliance package, a private balcony or patio, and an in-home washer/dryer.', 'Discover better living at Colton Apartments.', 'Features', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Breakfast Bar*', '- Balcony or Patio', '- Attached Garage*', '- Spacious Kitchen*', '- Granite Countertops*', '- Garden', 'Tub*', '- Pantry*', '- Gas Stove', '- Spotlights*', '- Walk-In Closets*', '- Mounted Microwave', '- In Home Washer and Dryer', '- Tech Station or Nook*', '- Den or Study*', '*Amenities may vary and are subject to change at any time', 'Community Amenities', '- Easy Access to Shopping', '- Outdoor Kitchen', '- Business Center', '- Beautiful Landscaping', '- Covered Parking', '- Cabanas', '- On-Call Maintenance', '- Outdoor Gaming', '- Fitness Center', '- Outdoor Lounge', '- Copy and Fax Services', '- Outdoor Pet Stations', '- Heated Pool', '- Indoor Kitchen', '- Fire Pit Lounge', '- Picnic Area with BBQ', '- Gated Access', '- Guest Parking', '- Clubhouse', '- Easy Access to Freeways', '- Free Pet Treats in Office', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets are welcome but limited to two per unit.', 'Please note that residents will be required to pay a $350 initial pet fee, along with a $150 deposit.', 'Additionally, monthly rent increases by $45 for those with pets.', 'Certain breed restrictions may apply.', 'Please see leasing office for details.', 'U2zV3Tr5']
